text:
How to clear/reset/replace an axis? This code keeps the old axis overlaid with the new one.
```using GLMakie
scene, layout = layoutscene()
display(scene)

# create axis and plot:
layout[1, 1] = ax = LAxis(scene)
scatter!(ax, rand(10), rand(10))

# make a completely different plot at the same layout position:
layout[1, 1] = ax = LAxis(scene)
scatter!(ax, rand(10), rand(10))```
